document.discussion_title: Lead warning at Indiana housing complex roils residents
document.topic_text: Lead warning at Indiana housing complex roils residents By Associated Press | August 21, 2016 @ 10:58 pm In this Wednesday, Aug. 3, 2016 photo, a child rides his bicycle past the West Calumet Housing Complex in East Chicago, Ind. More than 1,000 residents of a public housing complex in northwest Indiana have been left in a state of panic and uncertainty since authorities informed them last month that their homes need to be destroyed because of a serious lead contamination threat. (Jonathan Miano/The Times via AP)

(Jonathan Miano/The Times via AP)
